mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCTCODE, CATEGORY, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTCONTENT, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTDISCOUNT, PRODUCTSTOCK) VALUES (CONCAT('P',LPAD(PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL,4,'0')), #{category}, #{productName}, #{productContent}, #{productPrice}, #{productDiscount}, #{productStock})
INSERT INTO SIZES(SIZENUM, PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTSIZE) VALUES(SIZES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productCode}, #{productSize})
INSERT INTO COLOR (COLORNUM, PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTCOLOR) VALUES (COLOR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productCode}, #{productColor})
INSERT INTO IMAGE (IMAGENUM, PRODUCTCODE, TYPE, IMAGE) VALUES (IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productCode}, #{type}, #{image})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET CATEGORY = #{category}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productName}, PRODUCTCONTENT = #{productContent}, productPrice = #{productPrice}, PRODUCTDISCOUNT = #{productDiscount}, productStock = #{productStock} WHERE productCode = #{productCode}
mapper.delete: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCTUSED = 'N' WHERE PRODUCTCODE = #{productCode}
